message.content:
cs.LO, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.PL, cs.AI 

This paper deals with the synthesis of controllers for ordinal automata, which are models of physical systems with Zeno behavior. This topic is closely related to the fields of logic and automata theory, which are covered by the cs.LO sub-category. The paper also uses games techniques to solve a control problem, which is a common approach in the cs.GT sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with synchronization between the controller and the environment, which is a topic covered by the cs.SY sub-category. The paper also involves partial observability, which is a topic covered by the cs.PL sub-category. Finally, the paper uses automata to model physical systems, which is a topic covered by the cs.AI sub-category.
